item.name: Auth

request.description:
**URL:** `/auth/login`  
**Description:** Authenticate user and return JWT.  
**Body:** email, password  
**Returns:** user + token  
**Roles:** Public

response.name: 400 – Validation Error

request.description:
**URL:** `/auth/register`  
**Description:** Register a new user.  
**Body:** name, email, password, role  
**Returns:** user + token  
**Roles:** Public

response.name: 400 – Invalid Role
400 – Validation Error
409 – Conflict (Email Already Exists)
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 409,
    "success": false,
    "timestamp": "2025-12-10T15:55:51.595Z",
    "message": "
Invalid `this.prismaService.user.create()` invocation in
C:\Users\masa\Documents\room-reservation-api\src\modules\user\user.service.ts:21:48

  18 constructor(private readonly prismaService: DatabaseService) {}
  19 //   - createUser :service only
  20 async create(createUserDto: CreateUserDTO): Promise<UserResponseDTO> {
→ 21   const user = await this.prismaService.user.create(
Unique constraint failed on the constraint: `users_email_key`",
    "path": "/api/auth/register"
}

request.description:
**URL:** `/auth/validate`  
**Description:** Validate user token and return user.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** user + token  
**Roles:** Any authenticated user

item.description: Handles user authentication (login, registration, token validation).

item.name: Users

request.description:
**URL:** `/user`  
**Description:** Create a new user.  
**Body:** name, email, password, role  
**Returns:** created user  
**Roles:** Admin

**URL:** `/user`  
**Description:** Get all users with pagination.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** users + pagination  
**Roles:** Admin

response.name: 200 – Get Users (Admin)

request.description:
**URL:** `/user/:id`  
**Description:** Change a user's role.  
**Body:** role  
**Returns:** updated user  
**Roles:** Admin

**URL:** `/user/:id`  
**Description:** Get user by ID.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** user  
**Roles:** Admin

**URL:** `/user/:id`  
**Description:** Soft delete a user.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** boolean  
**Roles:** Admin

item.description: Admin-only endpoints for managing users in the system.

item.name: Rooms

request.description:
**URL:** `/room`  
**Description:** Create a new room.  
**Body:** name, capacity, price, status (optional)  
**Returns:** room  
**Roles:** Owner

**URL:** `/room`  
**Description:** List rooms with filters + pagination.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** rooms + pagination  
**Roles:** Admin, Owner, Guest (each sees different results)

response.name: 200 – Get Rooms (Guest)
200 – Get Rooms (Admin)
200 – Get Rooms (Pagination)
200 – Get Rooms (Price range)
200 – Get Rooms (Capacity range)
200 – Get Rooms (Date range)

request.description:
**URL:** `/room/:id`  
**Description:** Get room details by ID.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** room  
**Roles:** Any authenticated user

**URL:** `/room/:id`  
**Description:** Update room info.  
**Body:** name, capacity, price, status  
**Returns:** updated room  
**Roles:** Owner (only their own rooms)

**URL:** `/room/:id/status`  
**Description:** Change room status (AVAILABLE/UNAVAILABLE).  
**Body:** status  
**Returns:** updated room  
**Roles:** Admin

item.description: Endpoints for creating, viewing, and managing rooms.

item.name: Bookings

request.description:
**URL:** `/booking`  
**Description:** Create a booking for a room.  
**Body:** roomId, checkIn, checkOut  
**Returns:** created booking  
**Roles:** Guest

**URL:** `/booking/admin`  
**Description:** List all bookings with pagination.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** bookings + pagination  
**Roles:** Admin

**URL:** `/booking/me`  
**Description:** List bookings created by guest.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** bookings + pagination  
**Roles:** Guest

item.name: GET – Get Bookings For My Rooms (Owner)

request.description:
**URL:** `/booking/owner`  
**Description:** List bookings for rooms owned by the owner.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** bookings + pagination  
**Roles:** Owner

**URL:** `/booking/:id`  
**Description:** Get booking by ID.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** booking  
**Roles:** Admin, Owner, Guest (access rules apply)

response.name: 403 – Forbidden (Other Owner)
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 403,
    "success": false,
    "timestamp": "2025-12-10T21:38:44.182Z",
    "message": " owner can only access their rooms bookings",
    "path": "/api/booking/16"
}

request.description:
**URL:** `/booking/:id/status`  
**Description:** Change booking status.  
**Body:** status  
**Returns:** updated booking  
**Roles:** Admin

**URL:** `/booking/:id/cancel`  
**Description:** Cancel your own booking.  
**Body:** none  
**Returns:** boolean  
**Roles:** Guest

item.description: Endpoints for creating and managing room bookings based on user roles.
